modName: Breezehome Basement Utilities More Secret v1_5b
summary: This is a duplicate mod, but with secret door entering the stairs area. Details of the other mod can be found at the following link: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20029]Breezehome Basement Utilities and More[/url]
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a duplicate mod of another Breezehome Basement mod I made, but this one has a secret closet door entering the stairs area instead of the regular doors.

If you\'d like the regular doors and/or more information on this mod, it can all be found at the following links.

Skyrim Nexus (regular doors): [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20029]Breezehome Basement Utilities and More[/url]
Steam Workshop (regular doors): [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=80528395]Breezehome Basement Utilities and More[/url]
Steam Workshop (secret door): [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=83421063]Breezehome Basement Utilities More Secret[/url]

~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Not HearthFires compatible. I recommend my rebuilt basement mod:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=116624062]BreezehomeBasementUtilitiesTWO[/url]

~~~~~~~~~~~~

[color=orange]Note:[/color]
- You may have to go in and out of Breezehome and then restart the game to officially get rid of the regular doors. You can initially ignore them if you want since they don\'t prevent you from getting downstairs.
- When I make my mods I test the lighting while using the following mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654]Realistic Lighting and Customization[/url] (Skyrim Nexus)

~~~~~~~~~~~

[color=orange]v1.5b[/color]
- Edit description to show that I have a HearthFires\' compatible basement mod.
- No actual 1.5 file.

[color=orange]v1.4b[/color]
- Altered the navmesh a bit to keep the followers aways from the downstairs area and in turn keeps them from getting stuck.

[color=orange]v1.3b[/color]
- Made a duplicate mod that has a secret door entering the stairs area instead of the regular doors.
author: Guabuellaitor
